
                            
                            <p><img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/cheng/em1036.gif" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/cheng/em1036.gif"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/02/200155vph8pap8k692wzkw.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/02/200155vph8pap8k692wzkw.png"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/02/200155y0zmnxtoma8ccmfg.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/02/200155y0zmnxtoma8ccmfg.png"> <br>  <br>  <br> 就刚刚的事儿，我还纳闷，最近也没买东西，京东打电话来是干什么，接了后客服就问，买的这个移动电源使用有没有质量问题什么的，把我给问错愕了。 <br>  <br> 我说还没拆，她就说了几句常见话术，就挂断了。 <br>  <br>  <br> &nbsp;&nbsp;原线报贴 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/cheng/em1042.gif" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/cheng/em1042.gif"> 上次看到有吧友说这批货是从亚马逊上面不合规给撤下来的，我到手看外包装是外贸的，估计八九不离十。 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/02/200637h5bdzsfyzaz0bmh1.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/02/200637h5bdzsfyzaz0bmh1.png"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/cheng/em1036.gif" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/cheng/em1036.gif"> 用的吧友还是留心点儿，起码不要放在车上了。  <br> </p>
                            <p>
                                
                            </p>
